GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: Fix races among concurrent hw_params and hw_free calls

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.1 by commit 1bbf82d9f961414d6c76a08f7f843ea068e0ab7b. For more details please see the references link.
